levels.description: Launches a net forward, dragging all enemies caught within it towards this unit <@ba.vup>slightly</>, dealing <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as <@ba.vup>Arts damage</> and <$ba.sluggish>Slowing</> them for <@ba.vup>{sluggish}</> seconds
